title: Curtain Panel, late 18th–early 19th century
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: twill and plain weave
description: White curtain panel woven in groups of stripes in various widths. Weave structure alternates between twill and plain weave to produced raised stripes. Fitted with tapes for hanging.

tombstone.epitaph:
Curtain Panel, late 18th–early 19th century.Medium: cotton
Technique: twill and plain weave. 1965-58-1.
